name: Robert B. SKLAROFF, M.D., Petitioner v. Joel S. ARIO, Acting Insurance Commissioner for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent, Highmark, Inc., Intervenor; Capital Blue Cross, Capital Advantage Insurance Company, v. Pennsylvania Insurance Department, Respondent Robert B. Sklaroff, MD, Intervenor, Highmark, Inc., Intervenor, Petition of Robert B. Sklaroff, MD, Intervenor

parties: Robert B. SKLAROFF, M.D., Petitioner v. Joel S. ARIO, Acting Insurance Commissioner for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent, Highmark, Inc., Intervenor. Capital Blue Cross, Capital Advantage Insurance Company, v. Pennsylvania Insurance Department, Respondent Robert B. Sklaroff, MD, Intervenor, Highmark, Inc., Intervenor, Petition of Robert B. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of January, 2009, the Motion for Leave to File a Reply to Brief in Opposition and the Petitions for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

Sklaroff, MD, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 7, 2009.
